Instance.description: Item in the CAS context menu.

TunableTuple.name: actions
TunableTuple.description: Actions to perform when this menu item is selected.

TunableVariant.name: change_menu_state
TunableVariant.description: MenuState to change into. This value must be supported by the code, so this will most likely be provided by an engineer. To be deprecated. It is part of the old system.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: MenuState to change into. This value must be supported by the code, so this will most likely be provided by an engineer. To be deprecated. It is part of the old system.

TunableVariant.name: display_ui_widget
TunableVariant.description: Name of a UI widget that should be shown when this item is selected.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Name of a UI widget that should be shown when this item is selected.

Tunable.name: audio_component_name
Tunable.description: Optional name to associate with this item for the UI audio system.

TunableList.name: disable_reasons
TunableList.description: List of possible conditions under which this menu item should appear disabled.

TunableList.name: criteria
TunableList.description: Criteria which defines when this menu item should be disabled for the given reason.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: An element of CAS state to match against.

TunableList.name: active_occult_form
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's active occult form with this list. (This is only if the sim has an occult form active.)

TunableList.name: age
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's age with this list.

TunableList.name: allowed_packs
TunableList.description: Will only be allowed for packs in this list.

TunableList.name: gender
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's gender with this list.

TunableList.name: has_equipped_part
TunableList.description: Compare the current Sim's equipped parts with this list.

Tunable.name: has_paint_layer
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim has a paint layer present. Note: This is currently only valid for pets.

Tunable.name: in_genetics_mode
Tunable.description: Check if genetics mode is currently active.

Tunable.name: is_direct_manip_enabled
Tunable.description: Check if direct manip is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_fashion_mode
Tunable.description: Check if currently in fashion mode.

Tunable.name: is_full_edit_mode
Tunable.description: Check if full edit mode is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_mannequin
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim is a mannequin.

Tunable.name: is_new_sim
Tunable.description: Check if this is a newly-made sim.

TunableList.name: occult_type
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's occult type with this list.

TunableList.name: species
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's species with this list.

Tunable.name: exclude_if_matched
Tunable.description: Whether the item this criteria applies to should be excluded instead of included if this criteria is satisfied.

Tunable.name: reason
Tunable.description: The reason for disabling this menu item.

TunableList.name: icon_overrides
TunableList.description: List of possible overrides for the icons for this menu item. Each override will be evaluated in the order listed, the last override to satisfy its criteria will be used.

TunableTuple.name: icons
TunableTuple.description: Icons to use instead of the default icons. Note that you must specify all the desired icons here, even if they differ from the defaults. For example, if you wish to only override the selected icon, you still need to specify the default icon here as well.

Tunable.name: default_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to display for this menu item.

Tunable.name: new_content_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to use when there is new content related to this item. If not specified, will fall back to the default icon.

Tunable.name: selected_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to use for the selected state of the item. If not specified, will fall back to the default icon.

TunableList.name: override_criteria
TunableList.description: Criteria to determine when this set of icons should be used.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: An element of CAS state to match against.

TunableList.name: active_occult_form
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's active occult form with this list. (This is only if the sim has an occult form active.)

TunableList.name: age
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's age with this list.

TunableList.name: allowed_packs
TunableList.description: Will only be allowed for packs in this list.

TunableList.name: gender
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's gender with this list.

TunableList.name: has_equipped_part
TunableList.description: Compare the current Sim's equipped parts with this list.

Tunable.name: has_paint_layer
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim has a paint layer present. Note: This is currently only valid for pets.

Tunable.name: in_genetics_mode
Tunable.description: Check if genetics mode is currently active.

Tunable.name: is_direct_manip_enabled
Tunable.description: Check if direct manip is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_fashion_mode
Tunable.description: Check if currently in fashion mode.

Tunable.name: is_full_edit_mode
Tunable.description: Check if full edit mode is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_mannequin
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim is a mannequin.

Tunable.name: is_new_sim
Tunable.description: Check if this is a newly-made sim.

TunableList.name: occult_type
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's occult type with this list.

TunableList.name: species
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's species with this list.

Tunable.name: exclude_if_matched
Tunable.description: Whether the item this criteria applies to should be excluded instead of included if this criteria is satisfied.

TunableTuple.name: icons
TunableTuple.description: Default icons to use for the menu item.

Tunable.name: default_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to display for this menu item.

Tunable.name: new_content_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to use when there is new content related to this item. If not specified, will fall back to the default icon.

Tunable.name: selected_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to use for the selected state of the item. If not specified, will fall back to the default icon.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: Item name

TunableList.name: part_tags
TunableList.description: Tags to use for what parts to include in the displayed catalog. (09/26/2017 - Currently only one tag is supported but will be expanded to multiple later.)

TunableList.name: part_tags_exclude
TunableList.description: Tags to use for what parts to exclude in the displayed catalog. (11/10/2022 - Currently only one tag is supported but will be expanded to multiple later.)

TunableEnum.name: remove_action
TunableEnum.description: What action to perform when the remove button is clicked, if present.

TunableList.name: sim_click_activations
TunableList.description: Defines a list of areas on the sim that when clicked should cause this menu item to become selected.

TunableVariant.name: click_source
TunableVariant.description: The possible areas on which a sim might be clicked. Note: Clothing is only a valid option for pet sims.

TunableList.name: body_types
TunableList.description: Areas corresponding to sim BodyTypes.

TunableList.name: sim_regions
TunableList.description: Areas corresponding to SimRegions.

TunableTuple.name: criteria
TunableTuple.description: Criteria to determine if this click source should be enabled.

TunableList.name: match_all
TunableList.description: All criteria in this list must be matched to consider this collection of criteria satisfied.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: An element of CAS state to match against.

TunableList.name: active_occult_form
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's active occult form with this list. (This is only if the sim has an occult form active.)

TunableList.name: age
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's age with this list.

TunableList.name: allowed_packs
TunableList.description: Will only be allowed for packs in this list.

TunableList.name: gender
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's gender with this list.

TunableList.name: has_equipped_part
TunableList.description: Compare the current Sim's equipped parts with this list.

Tunable.name: has_paint_layer
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim has a paint layer present. Note: This is currently only valid for pets.

Tunable.name: in_genetics_mode
Tunable.description: Check if genetics mode is currently active.

Tunable.name: is_direct_manip_enabled
Tunable.description: Check if direct manip is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_fashion_mode
Tunable.description: Check if currently in fashion mode.

Tunable.name: is_full_edit_mode
Tunable.description: Check if full edit mode is enabled for the sim.

Tunable.name: is_mannequin
Tunable.description: Check if the current sim is a mannequin.

Tunable.name: is_new_sim
Tunable.description: Check if this is a newly-made sim.

TunableList.name: occult_type
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's occult type with this list.

TunableList.name: species
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's species with this list.

Tunable.name: exclude_if_matched
Tunable.description: Whether the item this criteria applies to should be excluded instead of included if this criteria is satisfied.

TunableList.name: match_any
TunableList.description: Any criteria in this list can be matched to consider this collection of criteria satisfied. Any criteria in match_all must also be matched.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: An element of CAS state to match against.

TunableList.name: active_occult_form
TunableList.description: Compare the current sim's active occult form with this list. (This is only if the sim has an occult form active.)

Tunable.name: is_fashion_mode
